title: Operation Uppercut
notes: ACFT prep - Upper body strength, push-up endurance, and 2-mile asessment integration.

warmup.description: 1 mile run at steady pace (input time), followed by dynamic mobility.
items: Run: 1 mile - steady pace, record time
10 push-ups + 10 air squats + 10 mountain climbers - 2 rounds

blocks.name: Strength Circuit
blocks.instructions: 3 rounds - move efficiently, rest 60s between rounds.
